Package com.transportexchangegroup.wortel.annotation

Annotation Type Aggregate

@Target(TYPE) @Retention(RUNTIME) @Scope("prototype") @Component public @interface Aggregate
This annotation marks a class as an aggregate. Note that the class still has to extend AbstractAggregate to function properly.

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    String
    aggregateCollectionName
    Gets name of the MongoDB collection the aggregate is saved to.
    String
    commandTopicName
    Gets command topic name.
    Class<? extends Event>
    eventClass
    Gets ancestor class of all events the aggregate emits and consumes.
    String
    eventCollectionName
    Gets name of the MongoDB collection the aggregate events are saved to.
    String
    eventTopicName
    Gets command topic name.

    Gets aggregate name.
    String
    value
     

  • Element Details

    • value

      @AliasFor(annotation=org.springframework.stereotype.Component.class) String value
      Default:
      ""

    • name

      String name
      Gets aggregate name. Aggregate name is assumed to coincide with class name if not set.
      Returns:
      aggregate name.
      Default:
      ""

    • commandTopicName

      String commandTopicName
      Gets command topic name. It is assumed to be `persistent://public/default/{name}-commands` if not set.
      Returns:
      command topic name.
      Default:
      ""

    • eventClass

      Class<? extends Event> eventClass
      Gets ancestor class of all events the aggregate emits and consumes. It is assumed to be Event if not set.
      Returns:
      ancestor class of the events for the aggregate.
      Default:
      com.transportexchangegroup.wortel.event.Event.class

    • eventTopicName

      String eventTopicName
      Gets command topic name. It is assumed to be `persistent://public/default/{name}-events` if not set.
      Returns:
      command topic name.
      Default:
      ""

    • aggregateCollectionName

      String aggregateCollectionName
      Gets name of the MongoDB collection the aggregate is saved to. It is assumed to coincide with aggregate class name if not set.
      Returns:
      name of the aggregate MongoDB collection.
      Default:
      ""

    • eventCollectionName

      String eventCollectionName
      Gets name of the MongoDB collection the aggregate events are saved to. It is assumed to coincide with event class name if not set
      Returns:
      name of the event MongoDB collection.
      Default:
      ""
